file.name: invalidParam.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: My API Spec
paths:
  /{id:
    get:
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: Ok

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /{id: get: operation "": parse path: invalid path: /{id
